exec_summary: 2024 marked a transformative year for Istanbul Robotics & AI Ltd. We doubled our R&D headcount, entered two new markets, and achieved record-breaking revenues driven by our warehouse automation line.

sections.title: Market Expansion
text: We launched distribution partnerships in Germany, Poland, and the UAE, unlocking a combined TAM of €3 billion.
Key to success was our multilingual support centre, staffed 24/7 in five languages.

subsections.title: Flagship Deployments
subsections.text: Our flagship IRAI-Flex robots were installed in three European mega-hubs.

sections.title: Innovation & R&D
text: Our patent portfolio grew to 68 active patents, with 14 new filings in 2024.
The newly established Perception Lab focuses on tactile sensing for fragile-item handling.

subsections.title: Perception Lab Highlights
subsections.text: We achieved sub-millimetre object classification accuracy with the FlexiGrasp sensor.

sections.title: Operational Excellence
text: Manufacturing lead time dropped from 10 to 7 weeks thanks to lean initiatives.
Customer satisfaction (CSAT) hit 94 %, the highest in our segment.

risks.description: Increasing competition in Europe could pressure margins

acknowledgements: We thank our 450 employees, partners, and shareholders for their dedication and trust in our mission to automate the world’s logistics.
